name: The Children of The Woods - Lost Tape
name_original: The Children of The Woods - Lost Tape
description:
"The Children of The Woods - Lost Tape" serves as a playable teaser of what can be expected from the upcoming found footage franchise called "The Children of The Woods". Through this first installment, viewers can explore events following the disappearances and the missing 5 individuals from a fresh viewpoint. It offers an immersive experience that delves deeper into the lore and history, providing insights into the origins of the featured footage in the forthcoming installments. It is crucial to remember that the truth is within the woods.

Game synopsis / story

You are Private Detective Dale Lincoln, and you are investigating the aftermath of the incident occurred in January of 1999. Use your night vision function on your camcorder to see details you may have missed with your naked eye. the deeper you go ,the closer you get to the truth .

Examine items, collect evidence, connect the dots, and beware, something is lurking in the woods.

Playtime 5-15 mins
